page.title: 14LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: The most popular weekday activities are housework and gardening.In Toft,Cawston and Thurlaston around half said they enjoy pottering around in the garden.Those who do not work enjoy sewing,knitting,reading and sport. Many do not go away on holiday and of those who do only three go abroad.Caravan holidays are most popular. Television is a popular activity.All the people interviewed enjoy watching T.V. in the evenings and some in the afternoons.They all liked listening to the radio, especially in the morning.The nearest small library is Dunchurch,although they do have a mobile library every Wednesday. Favourite non-fiction book areas are travel and countryside.No particular authors although a few do like Agatha Christie and Wilbur Smith.
